channel.title: [PI] JohnsWorld V1
channel.description:
[center]Hey guys, RS2BullDog here giving you another Server here :). Before you say about the server, It's in Alpha stage. It's still got bugs to fix and Dupes to sort out, and other stuff but it's still going on. I started this 3 Days ago and I have changed some stuff. It's all basic stuff but it's something. The Game is a 317 Project Insanity server loading a 474 Cache and Gameframe. It has custom items though but nothing much. It's only re-colored/re-coloured whips. They are not over powered because I did it like the Abyssal Whip that you get at the start. The strongest whip is the 'Red whip' which gives +200 Slash and +300 Strength. The Red whip though cannot be obtained by players. It can only be obtained by me editing their file. [size=24pt]Please Note: Im coding Project RuneScape V2 as well and that server is of a more Priority then this server.[/size] Also I will be hosting this as well. Just need to sort out a Dupe glitch and have saved some money for a basic VPS then it's all ready to go :) Anyway here's the Changelog and Media and all that stuff :)
Change Log: 15/12/2012 Re did the Crystal Chest Added Pyramid Plunder Added Crossbows to the Skill Interface with Levels Added Pyramid Plunder to Skills Interface with Levels FIXED SHOP DUPE GLITCH Added Addy to Armour Shop 16/12/2012 Re did Drops for Training and Bosses Re doing Drops in Tevearly Dungeon
Some Pics: [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Assault1.png[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Teleports.png[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Skill_Interface.png[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Recipe_for_Disaster.png[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/General_Store.png[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Clothing_Store.png[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Whips.png[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Player_Equipment_Tab.png[/img] Images Added after Post date: [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Pyramid_Plunder.png[/img] I will be adding more soon, but tell me what you think of it atm. Also Please don't flame on me. I haven't coded ages since PRS v1[/center]

item.title: [PI] JohnsWorld V1
item.dc:creator: @RS2BullDog RS2BullDog
item.description:
@RS2BullDog wrote:

Clawz fury:

Looks decent, if you want a respected server your going to have to remove those re-colored whips. It’s not even the fact that they are customs that bothers me, its just the fact that they are so unoriginal… If someone created a custom item and introduced it into the game very well (through a quest or something) then that would be great. Or even take an existing item and spin your own little twist on it. For example, I used the ‘device’ that shoots toads or whatever as a cannon. People loved it back when I owned a server, I actually introduced the concept of it with a quest, but there was only like 3 in the whole game hahaha sorry I’m rambling. Haven’t typed a post this long in awhile lol

lol It’s cool about you Rambling on

The whips, I kinda want to make the Near Reality type of thing. Although not as much as Near Reality has done. like over 20 whips or something. I’m just keeping to them 6. Besides the first 3 are obtained by the Donator store, and the Gold whip (The one I’m wielding in the skills interface) is obtained by the Crystal Key in the Chest.

Also thanks for the reply as well

Read full topic

People loved it back when I owned a server, I actually introduced the concept of it with a quest, but there was only like 3 in the whole game hahaha sorry I’m rambling. Haven’t typed a post this long in awhile lol
